snippet.title: Forklift Simulator | Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Coming soon! The forklift simulator will be released on August 29 on Xbox, PlayStation and PC! 📦 
Start your career in logistics! 
You can expect various missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can test your skills. 

You can pre-order the forklift simulator for Xbox from August 12!
Xbox 👉 https://links.aerosoft.com/ForkliftXbox
Steam 👉 https://links.aerosoft.com/ForkliftSteam
Playstation 👉 https://links.aerosoft.com/ForkliftPS
